d: Onyx is a versatile one-piece garment with several forms.

neckbandLength.d: Controls how long the neckband is, as a percentage of the circumference of the neckline.

neckbandWidth.d: Controls how wide the finished neckband will be.

hoodHem.d: Sets the hem allowance along the front of the hood, as a multiple of the seam allowance.

sleeveRibbing.d: Choose whether to make ribbed knit cuffs for the sleeves or to use a hem.

sleeveRibbingNo.d: Finish the sleeves with a hem.

sleeveRibbingYes.d: Finish the sleeves with a piece of ribbing.

sleeveRibbingLength.d: Controls how long the ribbing around the sleeve is, as a percentage of the sleeve circumference.

sleeveRibbingWidth.d: Controls how wide the ribbing around the sleeve is.

sleeveHem.d: Sets the hem allowance of the hem along the end of the sleeves, as a multiple of the seam allowance.

legRibbing.d: Choose whether to make ribbed knit cuffs for the legs or to use a hem.

legRibbingNo.d: Finish the legs with a hem.

legRibbingYes.d: Finish the legs with a piece of ribbing.

legRibbingLength.d: Controls how long the ribbing around the leg is, as a percentage of the leg circumference.

legRibbingWidth.d: Controls how wide the ribbing around the leg is.

legHem.d: Sets the hem allowance of the hem along the bottom of the legs, as a multiple of the seam allowance.

backOnFold.d: Enable this option to make the back out of a single piece, or disable to make it out of two mirrored pieces joined by a seam. It is recommended to disable this if placing a back zipper, and enable it otherwise.

backOnFoldNo.d: Cut two separate mirrored back pieces

backOnFoldYes.d: Cut the back as a single piece, on the fold

frontOnFold.d: Enable this option to make the front out of a single piece, or disable to make it out of two mirrored pieces joined by a seam. It is recommended to disable this if placing a front zipper, and enable it otherwise.

frontOnFoldNo.d: Cut two separate mirrored front pieces

frontOnFoldYes.d: Cut the back as a single piece, on the fold

zipperLength.d: The length of the zipper, as a percentage of the vertical trunk. It is recommended that you match this length (shown below in cm/in) to the length of the actual zipper, measured from lower stop to upper stop.

zipperGuardWidth.d: How wide to make the zipper guard.

neckGuardLength.d: How far to have the zipper guard extend past the top of the zipper.

skirtHem.d: Sets the hem allowance of the hem along the bottom of the skirt, as a multiple of the seam allowance.

skirtWaistband.d: Sets the width of the waistband along the top of the skirt, as a multiple of the seam allowance.

hoodHeight.d: Controls how tall the hood will be.

hoodDepth.d: Controls how much room will be in the hood around the back of the head.

centerSeamEase.d: Controls how long the center seam will be, and thus how low the crotch fork of the garment will be.

outseamEase.d: Controls how far down the garment the waist, hips, seat, and upper leg points on the outseam will be.

chestEase.d: Controls how wide the garment will be around the chest.

waistEase.d: Controls how wide the garment will be around the chest.

hipsEase.d: Controls how wide the garment will be at the bottom hem. This option is only used if the straight sides option is disabled.

seatEase.d: Controls how wide the seat is.

crotchGussetWidth.d: Controls how wide the crotch gusset will be. Adjust so that the front and back pieces look smooth and clean around the crotch fork and upper legs. Deeper thighs and abdomens require a larger value, while wider ones require a smaller value.

upperLegEase.d: Controls how wide the garment will be around the upper legs.

legHemEase.d: Controls how wide the bottom of the legs will be.

neckBalance.d: Controls where the neck hole is placed on the garment.

neckEase.d: Controls how large the neck hole is.

sleeveEase.d: Affects how wide the sleeve is at the armhole on all garments, and has some affect on the width at the hem of short sleeved garments.

wristEase.d: Affects how wide the end of the sleeve is on sleeves that extend past the biceps. The effect is greater on longer sleeves.

neckStyle.d: Select whether you want to add a hood to the garment, or finish the neck with a neckband.

neckStyle.neckband.d: Finish the neck with a neckband.

neckStyle.hood.d: Generate a hood for the garment.

sleeveLength.d: Controls how long the sleeves of the garment will be.

legLength.d: Controls how long the legs of the garment will be.

hoodFrontPieceSize.d: Controls if a front piece will be used, and how wide the front piece of the hood will be.

hoodFrontBonus.d: Controls how far forward the hood comes over the forehead.

hoodFrontDip.d: Controls far down the front of the hood drops over the forehead.

skirt.d: Select whether or not you want to add a simple gathered skirt around the waist of the garment.

skirtNo.d: A skirt will not be generated.

skirtLength.d: Controls the length of the skirt, as a percentage of the waist to upper leg measurement.

skirtWidth.d: Controls the width of the skirt at the bottom, as a percentage of the waist measurement.

legTaperPosition.d: Controls how the lower legs are laid out on the pattern.

raglanScoopLength.d: Controls how far out from the armhole the raglan seam starts to scoop.

raglanScoopMagnitude.d: Controls how much extra material to place under the armpits.
